Title: The Beard
Plot: Elaine tries to convert a gay man to heterosexuality. George, who's now wearing his toupee, discovers that the woman Kramer has set him up with, is bald. Kramer gives a homeless man some Chinese food and begins standing in police lineups for $50 a lineup. Jerry begins to date a cop, but she wants him to take a lie detector test, she thinks he is lying about NOT watching Melrose Place.
GuestStars: Jon Gries, Robert Mailhouse, Katherine La Nasa, Edward Winter, Georgann Johnson, Joan Elizabeth, John F. O'Donohue, Jerry Diner, Mirron E. Willis, Ken Kerman
